name: Nair Hair Remover Cocoa Butter 9oz.- Pack of 3
short_description: One (1) 9-ounce bottle of Nair Hair Removal Body Cream With Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E
Quick, easy and effective option for painless hair removal from the Number 1 hair removal brand among depilatory/wax/bleach products (Data from AC Nielsen, Total AOC Latest 52 Weeks ending 11/30/21)
Instant hair removal cream with cocoa butter and vitamin E to beautify your skin while removing body hair
Hair remover formulated for use on legs, arms, underarms and bikini area; not for use on face
Dermatologist-tested body hair removal in as little as 3 minutes
product_description: Nair Hair Removal Body Cream With Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E puts you on your way to blade free, hair free, carefree skin. This dermatologist-tested cocoa butter cream delivers powerful body hair removal, helping you stay smooth for days longer than shaving. Infused with rich cocoa butter and vitamin E, this hair removal cream moisturizes and revitalizes skin, giving you smooth skin you’re proud to show off. Fast and easy, this cream thoroughly removes body hair below the skin’s surface for painless hair removal. Nair body and leg hair remover cream is intended for the legs, arms, underarms and bikini area; it is not formulated for use on the face. To remove hair, apply a thick, even layer of hair removal cream to desired areas. Leave on for 3 to 10 minutes depending on hair thickness, then gently wipe away with a damp washcloth. Once all hair has been removed, rinse skin thoroughly and pat dry. Always patch test before using. Nair offers a full range of high-quality, easy-to-use hair remover products. Our made-for-everyone, multitasking, magical formulas give you hair-free, carefree skin that lasts days longer than shaving. Because everyone deserves to feel amazing in their own skin.

name: SoftSheen-Carson Magic Razorless Shaving Cream, Depilatory Hair Removal Cream, Works in 4 Minutes for Coarse, Curly Hair, 2 Count
short_description: Razorless Cream Shave for Bald Heads: The best way to get rid of razor bumps is to get rid of the razor! Our depilatory cream features a light fresh scent, works in 4 minutes and lasts for 4 days.
For All Beard Types: Magic Razorless Cream Shave comes in 4 formulations: Regular Strength, Extra Strength, and Bald Head Maintenance, plus our classic powder formulation. No shaving with a razor!

Shaving Products: We make an array of products for all beard types and shaved heads, including razorless depilatory creams and powders to prevent razor bumps, plus exfoliating cleansers and moisturizers.
For Mens' Grooming Needs: From shaving to hair color, pomade and hair moisturizer, find the products specifically formulated for black men that suit your grooming routine.
Softsheen-Carson: For over 110 years we have provided beauty to all consumers of African descent with our innovative, tailor-made, superior products and services specially designed for their needs.
product_description: Our Razorless Cream Shave has been formulated to help stop razor bumps and give a closer shave than a razor to all body parts. This hair removal cream features a light fresh scent and works in 4 minutes to last for 4 days. Before using Magic Cream Shave for the first time, the following test must be performed. Wait at least 36 hours after using a razor or depilatory product before doing this test. Apply cream to a quarter size area of body hair. Wait 4 minutes before removing. Do not scrape. Rinse area thoroughly. After 24 hours, if there is no sign of irritation or redness follow directions on product. The more you use Magic Shave the better it works. We believe in beauty without compromise. IMPORTANT: Contains Thioglycolate. If skin is inflamed or has abrasions, sores or pustules, consult a dermatologist before use. Conduct sensitivity test before use. Wait 36 hours after using any razor or shaving powder before using this product. Do not use with any after shave product containing alcohol. This is a safety summary. Read all product labeling and instructions completely.

name: Veet 3 Minute Facial Hair Removal Cream for Women, Depilatory Cream with Organic Aloe Vera, 2 Piece Women's Facial Hair Remover Kit, 1.7 Fl Oz Hair Removal Cream + 1.7 Fl Oz Finishing Cream
short_description: VEET HAIR REMOVAL CREAM: Experience pain-free** facial hair removal for women with the Veet 3 Minute Face Cream Kit featuring soothing organic aloe vera* & a raspberry & violet fragrance for gentle, effective face fuzz removal in just minutes
FLAWLESS HAIR REMOVER: Our facial hair remover kit includes a gentle finishing cream that leaves skin smooth & moisturized; get perfectly smooth & hair-free skin in just 4 easy steps

EASY FACE HAIR REMOVAL FOR WOMEN: Veet 3 Minute face hair removal cream for women is ideal for upper lip, chin, and cheeks, offering a pain-free** alternative to face wax strips or face razors with lasting hydration
UPPER LIP HAIR REMOVAL: Our face depilatory cream is quick & easy to use, allowing you to incorporate simple hair removal into your grooming routine
NO RAZOR BURN OR CUTS: This hair removal cream for face removes unwanted facial hair in as little as 3 minutes, leaving your skin smooth and hair-free without the pain of waxing or shaving

EFFECTIVE HAIR REMOVER FOR WOMEN: Veet's 3 Minute Face Cream Kit is dermatologically-tested and has a gentle formula made with carefully selected ingredients; Enriched with organic aloe vera* for a smooth, moisturized finish that lasts up to 48 hours
product_description: Discover a pain-free** and effective solution for facial hair removal with the Veet 3 Minute Face Cream Kit. As the #1 depilatory brand worldwide†, Veet offers a gentle yet powerful formula that removes unwanted facial hair in as little as 3 minutes. Whether you're dealing with upper lip hair, chin hair, or peach fuzz, this depilatory cream provides an easy, hassle-free alternative to traditional facial razors, face wax kits, or dermaplaning tools for face hair removal. Infused with organic aloe vera*, Veet’s facial hair removal cream for women not only eliminates unwanted hair but also intensely hydrates your skin for up to 48 hours, leaving it soft and smooth. The refreshing raspberry and violet fragrance makes each application a pleasant experience, while the gentle formula ensures a comfortable hair removal process. The kit includes one hair removal cream & one finishing cream, specially designed for women’s facial hair removal, & delivers flawless, hair-free results in just four easy steps. This versatile cream is ideal for upper lip, chin, & cheeks, & can also be used on legs, arms, underarms, & bikini line. It’s ideal for those who want to avoid the pain & inconvenience of wax strips or the irritation of womens face shavers. Veet's dermatologically-tested 3 Minute Face Cream Kit is the ultimate solution for smooth, hair-free skin with lasting hydration. Say goodbye to facial fuzz & enjoy the confidence of beautifully soft, hair-free skin in minutes.

name: Flamingo Women's Body Hair Removal Cream - (2 Pack) 6.76 fl oz - Removes Hair from Legs, Arms, Underarms, Stomach, and Bikini Line
short_description: GENTLE BODY HAIR REMOVAL: Quickly and gently removes hair from legs, underarms, bikini line, arms, and stomach; Keeps skin smooth for up to 6 days

SAFE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Gentle cream designed with sensitive skin in mind for a smooth, irritation-free experience. Before every use, always check for the reaction of your skin by applying Body Hair Removal Cream to a small part of the area you're treating, following the instructions for use.

EASY APPLICATION: Includes a spatula applicator for precise, touch-free application. Use the spatula tool to apply an even, thick, opaque layer on clean, dry skin. Make sure the hair is covered completely. Don't rub the product in—just spread it enough that it covers the hair and skin. After 5 minutes, remove a small test area with the spatula. If hair doesn't come off easily, leave on longer.
DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED: Free from parabens, dermatologist-tested, and cruelty-free; Elevated with the light, subtle scent of iris and suede
HOW TO USE: Apply a thick, even layer with spatula and cover hair completely, wait 5-10 minutes, remove, and rinse thoroughly with water. DO NOT EXCEED 10 minutes total.
product_description: Forget the harsh versions you've used in the past—we've reimagined hair removal for women. Flamingo Body Hair Removal Cream for women is designed to gently remove body hair from areas like legs, underarms, arms, stomach, and the bikini line, leaving skin feeling smooth for days. Formulated with sensitive skin in mind, this Flamingo hair removal cream is an effective and gentle alternative to shaving. The spatula applicator allows for easy, touch-free application, while a subtle iris and suede scent sets this hair remover cream apart from your typical overwhelmingly fragranced hair removal creams.

name: Nair Hair Remover Seaweed Leg Mask, Depilatory, 8 Oz Bottle
short_description: One (1) 8-ounce bottle of Nair Hair Remover Seaweed Leg Mask Depilatory
Three-in-one leg mask gives you smooth and radiant legs by removing hair and stubble, exfoliating and moisturizing skin, and minimizing hair regrowth (vs. shaving)
Infused with seaweed and natural clay to help exfoliate dead skin cells and lock in moisture
Hair remover formulated for use on legs and feet; not for use on face
Easy and painless hair removal formulated to work on normal to coarse hair in as little as 5 minutes
product_description: Nair Hair Remover Seaweed Leg Mask Depilatory is a brilliant addition to your leg hair removal routine. Infused with 100% natural clay and seaweed, this leg mask draws out and removes hair, dirt, oil and other nasty things, so soft, stubble-free legs are yours. This dermatologist-tested leg hair remover formula is also phthalate free and paraben free. Best of all, this leg mask hair remover lets you stay smoother longer by making hair grow back slower. Fast and easy, this hair remover helps exfoliate dead skin cells while thoroughly removing body hair below the skin’s surface for painless leg hair removal that leaves skin feeling smooth for longer. Nair Leg Mask can be used on the legs and feet, but is not meant for use on the face. This Nair leg and foot mask is great for all skin types and is effective on normal to coarse hair. To remove hair, smooth a layer of Nair hair removal leg mask over dry legs. Leave the mask on for 5 to 10 minutes depending on hair thickness, then gently wipe off the mask with a damp washcloth. Once all hair has been removed, rinse skin thoroughly and pat dry. It’s that easy! Make sure to always patch test before using. Trusted since its introduction in 1940, Nair has always been a leader in hair removal. Nair offers a full range of high-quality, easy-to-use hair remover products. Our made-for-everyone, multitasking, magical formulas give you hair-free, carefree skin that lasts days longer than shaving. Because everyone deserves to feel amazing in their own skin.

product_description: Now live more spontaneous moments with Veet Hair Remover Cream that removes even stubborn hair in just few minutes. Enriched with active ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, this hair removal cream for women moisturizes, leaving your skin feeling smooth and soft. The sensitive hair removal cream comes with delightful fragrance for a satisfying and breathtaking experience. This aloe vera hair removal cream is dermatologically tested and can be used for legs, arms, underarms and bikini hair removal. The results of Veet may last up to twice as long as shaving. It comes in a tube for easy dispensing, applying and removal. Caution: Before every use, test your skin by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area as skin is a sensitive part of the body. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. Veet cream is not suitable for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples. Read pack for full instructions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.
